issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

fields.summary: Studio: Mobile Web should be supported as target for studio templates

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps To Reproduce
1. Create a new mobile application with the Master/Detail Window template
2. Compile mobile web to browser

Actual:
Blank Page

Expected:
To display a table row with data and detail view for each selected item
fields.summary: MobileWeb: Master/Detail view is not supported and a blank page is displayed

comments.body: Master/Detail view works fine now. Most likely support for whatever feature was missing when the ticket was filed has since been implemented.
